entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, introduced as a powerful and intimidating figure who is trying to control Harry's mind.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, being controlled by Voldemort's Imperio curse.

relationships.description: Voldemort is controlling Harry's mind through the Imperio curse, as described in the text: 'I asked you whether you want me to do that again,' said Voldemort softly. 'Answer me! Imperio!'
